h2_title: How to Find Son of Stones
h1_content: Son of Stone is one of the optional Yaoguai Chiefs you can fight in Chapter 6 of Black Myth: Wukong"). You can take on this boss as one of the last in the Foothills of Chapter 6 before you head off to the Water Curtain Cave.
h2_content: From the Mantis-Catching Swamp, fly up and back toward the area where you fought the Gold Armored Rhino and Cloudtreading Deer. We now want to stop on the left, to get the Son of Stones, which is the boss sitting at the edge of the cliff on the left with the neon blue glow.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Son_of_Stones.md', located in the main section titled 'Son of Stones'. The section summary is: Son of Stone is one of the optional Yaoguai Chiefs you can fight in Chapter 6 of Black Myth: Wukong"). You can take on this boss as one of the last in the Foothills of Chapter 6 before you head off to the Water Curtain Cave. This excerpt merges content from both the main and sub-sections. The sub-section is titled 'How to Find Son of Stones', and the detailed content is as follows:
From the Mantis-Catching Swamp, fly up and back toward the area where you fought the Gold Armored Rhino and Cloudtreading Deer. We now want to stop on the left, to get the Son of Stones, which is the boss sitting at the edge of the cliff on the left with the neon blue glow.
